descriptionHtml:
[img]http://www.brainpoof.com/personalimages/unpetite_bondage.jpg[/img]

Requires UNPetite. Download it [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35748/?tab=1&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D35748%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Here[/url].

For the Boots, Gloves and Mask download the original mod from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19067/?tab=1&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D19067%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Here[/url].

[img]http://www.brainpoof.com/personalimages/disclaimer.jpg[/img]
You are responsible for downloading and installing this mod. If you screw something up, it's on you.

[img]http://www.brainpoof.com/personalimages/description.jpg[/img]
This is a reupload of the Bondage Armor which is a mashup of various authors works (Check Credits).
The purpose for the reupload of this mashup is because I split it into 4 separately equipable pieces.
It can be mixed and matched with other armors from various mods such as those from the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22168/?tab=1&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D22168%26preview%3D&pUp=1]03 - UNPetite Hmm What To Wear[/url].
All credit goes to NPR and Cold Blood for the original work.


[img]http://www.brainpoof.com/personalimages/installation.jpg[/img]
1. Download and Install via NMM or by dropping the files in the data folder.
2. Activate the esp file.
3. Go to the forge and craft it in the Miscellaneous section.

[img]http://www.brainpoof.com/personalimages/compatibilities.jpg[/img]
- Anything compatible with UNPetite.

[img]http://www.brainpoof.com/personalimages/credits.jpg[/img]
Bethesda, Nifskope, Autodesk, Niftools (Figment)
Dimonized for creating the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709/?tab=1&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D6709%26preview%3D&pUp=1]UNP model[/url].
NPR for the awesome mesh and texture work done back in the old days of Oblivion.
Cold Blood for the awesome mesh and texture work done back in the days of Oblivion.
author: Nightasy
